content.question: A. Using the graph, compare the wheat production trend lines of East Asia and Europe from 2001 to 2016. B. Explain how mechanization and irrigation had an impact on wheat farming in South Asia. C. Explain how the Green Revolution impacted farming in African countries relative to agriculture in East Asian countries. D. Using ONE region on the graph, explain the relationship between changes in wheat farming practices and the fertility rate.

frqParts.text: A. Using the graph, compare the wheat production trend lines of East Asia and Europe from 2001 to 2016. B. unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain what maps or data imply or illustrate about geographic principles, processes, and outcomes.
